sub-list.name: Connect
sub-list.code:
<?php
$servername = "localhost";
$username = "username";
$password = "password";
$dbname = "myDB";

// Create connection
$conn= mysqli_connect($servername,$username,$password,$dbname);
// Check connection
if (!$conn) {
  die("Connection failed: " . mysqli_connect_error());
}
echo "Connected Successfully.";
?>

sub-list.name: Importing components
sub-list.description:
Replace Todos with class name 
 If you change the path where 
components are stored please update accordingly
 while using it in the render method please use tags like <Todos />

sub-list.name: Passing props
sub-list.code:
<Todos
         todos={this.state.todos}
         markComplete={this.markComplete}
         delTodo={this.delTodo}
 />;

 //This can be accessed in the called componenet using 
this.props.todos

sub-list.name: Saving variables in State
sub-list.description: Inside the Render method there is a method called State. Declare your variables there.

sub-list.name: For each loop substitute
Styling
Add Bootstrap
sub-list.code:
1.run commnad in cmd
npm install bootstrap --save

2.after install add this to index.js
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';
